page.title: 02MINSTERSTONE,ILMINSTER.
page.content: It was in the 1920's that the "Wharf Lane Concrete Company"was opened in Wharf Lane,Ilminster,and it was in 1965 the factory moved and the name was changed to Minsterstone (Wharf Lane) Limited. Minster builds and makes such things as pots,bird-baths and fireplaces These are made from ground stone and cement which is then moulded.It looks like stone but does not need to be carved as it has already been shaped in the moulding process.In Minsterstone they make models of animals, birds and of people.Minsterstone is quite a big factory.140 people work there.The average price of a fireplace is from Â£322-Â£1000 and some are even over Â£1600.They export to America and they sell to all the British Isles.
